verses.roman:
kaṁsa-pratāpitāḥ sarve
vayaṁ yātā diśaṁ diśam
etarhy eva punaḥ sthānaṁ
daivenāsāditāḥ svasaḥ

synonyms: kaṁsa—by Kaṁsa; pratāpitāḥ—severely troubled; sarve—all; vayam—we; yātāḥ—went away; diśam diśam—in various directions; etarhi eva—just now; punaḥ—again; sthānam—to our proper places; daivena—by Providence; āsāditāḥ—brought; svasaḥ—O sister.
translation: Harassed by Kaṁsa, we all fled in various directions, but by the grace of Providence we have now finally been able to return to our homes, my dear sister.
